mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (id, user_id, product_id, quantity, price, status, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{status}, NOW())
INSERT INTO orders(id, user_id, product_id, quantity, price, status, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{status}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'Paid' ORDER BY create_time DESC;

mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.quantity AS orderQuantity, o.price AS orderPrice, o.status AS orderStatus, o.create_time AS orderCreateTime, p.id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.description AS productDescription, p.price AS productPrice, u.id AS userId, u.username AS userUsername, -- 保持与resultMap一致 u.email AS userEmail, u.phone AS userPhone, u.address AS userAddress FROM orders o LEFT JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.user_id = u.id ORDER BY o.create_time DESC

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.quantity AS orderQuantity, o.price AS orderPrice, o.status AS orderStatus, o.create_time AS orderCreateTime, p.id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.description AS productDescription, p.price AS productPrice, u.id AS userId, u.username AS userUsername, u.email AS userEmail, u.phone AS userPhone, u.address AS userAddress FROM orders o LEFT JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.user_id = u.id WHERE o.create_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) ORDER BY o.create_time DESC;

SELECT o.id AS orderId, o.quantity AS orderQuantity, o.price AS orderPrice, o.status AS orderStatus, o.create_time AS orderCreateTime,
p.id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.description AS productDescription, p.price AS productPrice, p.image_name AS productImage,
u.id AS userId, u.username AS userUsername, u.email AS userEmail, u.phone AS userPhone, u.address AS userAddress
FROM orders o LEFT JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN user u ON o.user_id = u.id WHERE o.id = #{orderId}
